website_summaries.verdict: These delicious calcium gummy supplements provide 500 milligrams of calcium per serving, helping to strengthen bones and prevent osteoporosis.
pros: No HFCS, artificial sweeteners, gluten, or dairy
Includes 1,000 IU of vitamin D to enhance absorption
cons: Does not contain magnesium, which is needed for proper calcium absorption

website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly calcium supplement that is easy to consume and delivers proven results.
pros: Each gummy includes 500 mg of calcium and 1,000 IU of vitamin D3
Gummies have a pleasant natural fruit and cream flavor
Specially formulated to support adult bone and teeth health
Each serving has as much calcium as two 6-ounce glasses of milk
cons: Flavor may be too strong for some users
Gummies are much larger than many comparable gummy supplements

customer_reviews.title: READ THE LABEL
customer_reviews.text: All these years I incorrectly assumed the 500 mg of calcium in big letters on the label meant that I should take 2 a day to get my needed 1000 mg of calcium a day. After a disappointing review of my recent bone scan, I realized that I have to take 4 a day. 500 is per serving size, and serving size is 2. Therefore all these years I have only been taking half of my necessary requirement for bone health. I can only say that I am chagrined because I thought I was pretty smart about my health. Now I have to start taking a prescription because of my ignorance, and I have TWO college degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Piano doglady

customer_reviews.title: Old
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before. First time I ordered it from Amazon and it was good. Second time I got it from Costco and it was good. Costco was out so I just ordered this product again, but when I received it the calcium squares are tough. They are definitely not fresh. There's a big difference. They're chewable. but they're not soft like I've had them before. These ones are tough. So it is obviously old. I'm stuck with this bottle and having to use it, but I will be trying a different seller next time. I'm not very happy with this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Skiee

customer_reviews.title: Watch out people with a sugar tooth! Very addicting!
customer_reviews.text: I love taking gummy vitamins vs the ones you have to swallow. I discovered these while I was in college and there was no going back. I WISH they made these as regular gummies because I could probably overdose on calcium eating these. Its really hard to restrict myself to only eating 2 a day. These are sooo good! Now whether they actually do anything, I couldn't tell you. I had to start taking them because the birth control shot has a side effect of loss of bone density. I haven't experienced any bad side effects from eating these.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Helps Keep my bones healthy.
customer_reviews.text: My body tends to be low in calcium. My system doesn't process the hard pills but I have found it does process the gummies. This brand has 500mg per gummy and I take two per day. I love the subscription service. It is shipped to me every other month, without fail. I used to check the ads every month to find out which store had the best deal. Now I don't have to. The gummy vitamins are difficult to find in town. I also use the subscription service for vitamin D and digestive gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a calcium supplement since I don't get enough in my diet. Unfortunately I can't stomach the chalky antacid generally used as a calcium supplement, so I decided to try a gummy. Enter Vitafusion. This gummy is so stinking good it's all I can do not to eat the entire bottle in one sitting. Definitely keep this away from young kids. I don't experience any bad aftertaste or stomach upset, but I do take one in the morning and one later in the day. I added this to my monthly subscribe and save and will never go back to the chalky supplements - I hope they never stop making this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste/texture
customer_reviews.text: I have used calcium "gummies" before, but never this brand. Amazon didn't have the brand I wanted so I substituted these. Poor choice on my part. They are hard and difficult to chew and their taste is bitter and has no flavor I could discern. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: KWAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great taste.
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally not a fan of dairy products but calcium and Vitamin D are important to bone health and those can only be found on dairy products like milk and cheese. These chewables are easy to swallow. They tastes great, and the price is very reasonable. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mother because she was having trouble swallowing another calcium tablet she was taking and these she finds much easier because she can chew and taste better - she has been taking them for a month or so now - so we don't know yet how it is being absorbed until she takes her bone density test in another year or so. But we will stick with them because they are easier for her.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Palocin

customer_reviews.title: Milk allergy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get if you have a milk allergy, it’s not listed in the ingredients but I still reacted.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Overly Sweet (Yuck) and High in Carbs
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are coated with sugar and they’re sickeningly sweet. One gummy has 7 grams of carbs. Ridiculous. Those on keto - find a lower carb option. Wish I had read the label more carefully. Even without that drawback, they are just way too sweet, which makes them taste bad. I wasn’t looking for candy!
customer_reviews.author: Blizz

customer_reviews.title: How do the heat-soluable vitamins survive being made into gummies?
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to chew, tastes good (no aftertaste), but I often wonder how many of the vitamins I am actually getting. I know that some of the vitamins listed on the label are affected by heat.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Basically candy.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. This tastes exactly like gummy candy. I suspect that's basically all it is and contains no calcium at all.
customer_reviews.author: Earthchild

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than the chocolate or caramel flavored ones because I don't have to fight to get them out of individual wrapping. The taste is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use of these vitamins. One in the morning and one in the evening. It is interesting that my account says the package was 'left in the mailroom'. It was actually delivered to my home where there is no mailroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. Weren't expired, which was something I had reservations about. So they weren't hard. The taste is OK and they're not too big. 2 are recommended, but I've been OK with just 1. I wasn't expecting them to be "sugar-coated" (don't think it's real sugar). But it brushes off easy, if you don't want it.
customer_reviews.author: OpalJingle

customer_reviews.title: Gummy!  How easy can it get?
customer_reviews.text: These gummy calcium supplement couldn't be easier or more tasty. I hate taking pills and vitamins but realize I need calcium. These are perfect as they give me additional calcium and the taste is great!
customer_reviews.author: Spuds

customer_reviews.title: Not the best taste
customer_reviews.text: These taste odd to me, definitely not my favorite. I purchased them because I am pregnant, but cannot consume dairy, so I need an extra calcium supplement. I will be switching back to my usual brand, likely before these are even all used up.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Not great mouth feel
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is good but the chew factor. I have other supplement gummies for quick absorption that I take so I feel like I know what tastes and feels good in my mouth for me :). I dread chewing these....they feel tough and have a sugary feel to the outside which feels gross in my mouth. I won't buy these again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tempe H

customer_reviews.title: They taste fine, but they're a little more firm than some ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the texture of these gummies. They taste fine, but they're a little more firm than some other calcium gummies. I'm not sure how much more potency these have over the Kirkland brand which I usually use, but taste and texture-wise I would prefer the Kirkland calcium gummies they sell at Costco over these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Karakani

customer_reviews.title: YUMMMM
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help me look forward to taking my vitamin each day. Now, it feels like a treat! The flavors are delicious and the texture is not gummy or too chewy. I have these coming to the house every month with the re-order feature on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail E

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: My kids will love these chewable calcium vitamin chews. In fact it's one of the few that they will eat. They taste good and my kids look forward to taking them. Didn't know how to Mark the absorbency. Not exactly sure how much we're actually absorbing LOL
customer_reviews.author: Michelle VanDeel

customer_reviews.title: Recieved Calcium with D, bot what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Took a very long time to get and when they arrived they were not what I ordered. They did include vitamin D in addition to calcium so most would be happy, but I already take D and get weekly infusions so I have to be careful about changing amounts on what I take. Wish they had sent what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and good for you
customer_reviews.text: I get the calcium my doctor wants me to get, and I get a treat for doing that. Two gummies are 500 mg. of calcium along with some Vitamen D to help the calcium work. The flavors are OK, and the gummies kind of fun to eat. Who says we're too old for fun.
customer_reviews.author: P. Penwood

customer_reviews.title: I do like these, but almost too sugary.
customer_reviews.text: These came packaged as expected. They taste like creamy sugar cubes (almost too creamy-sugary for my liking). They are "okay"- not bad at all- but not sure I'd order again. Might look for something a little less candy-like.
customer_reviews.author: Bestest_Name_Ever

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, work great too
customer_reviews.text: I do feel a difference in getting through the mornings with energy when I take these before work. They taste great and are easy to chew. Good vitamins, great deal. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does contain some sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I take it to replace depleting bone density in my body. The reason I like it is because it sure beats taking those huge Calcium pills! Even though I broke the pills in half, I still had to contend with the jagged edges and ended up not taking them at all. I was very happy to see the Vitafusion advertised so gave it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questions don't fit this product
customer_reviews.text: It isn't too be swallowed, so useless to have to answer that question. I have no idea about absorbency, how would anyone know that? flavor is OK, would rate higher if I didn't have to wash off the extra sugar coating.
customer_reviews.author: Marion  vonBeck

customer_reviews.title: Do your research because your doctor won't...
customer_reviews.text: These gummies taste good and it made me remember to take them. I loved the idea of eating candy for a good reason :) Then I found out (reading an article) that these supplements might actually be causing heart attacks in people rather than improving health. Why doctors do not tell their patients this is a mystery. If you have to read this information in a magazine....isn't that a dereliction of duty??? Now, I make sure to get my calcium the good ole fashioned way....yogurt, almond milk and cheese. So, sorry to say, I can't use these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Starboard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My elderly mom , residing in assisting living center relies on them. For some reason we often neglect the importance of providing our aging population with vitamins, minerals and supplements which may give them some advantage over catching everything thing going around. They also seem to help in attitude, vim and vigor, and in our eighties and nineties...who doesn't need a little boost? She loves the fact that she can enjoy them and not choke on a pill form. I buy them from Amazon because they will deliver them directly to her; she resides in another state! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Meets my supplement needs
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins contain the daily calcium I need and are convenient to take daily without needing water. The size of the bottle means they last for some time. The only negative for my taste is that they are too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Flavor was not great
customer_reviews.text: These tastes like they had a cream taste to them which was kind of gross. We used them until they were gone, but bought a different brand with different flavors this last time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Too much Sugar!!
customer_reviews.text: The coating of the gummy is cevered with sugar. Initially I dust the sugar off and saw it amounted to a teaspoon of sugar. Now I wash them off before consuming. The actual gummy is good...but it's just too much sugar...
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha

customer_reviews.title: A must chew gummy
customer_reviews.text: You cannot swallow these. You must chew them and they are very dense. They taste like a fruity creamy chewy candy. Not sure if I am fond of them but I am getting used to them
customer_reviews.author: K. Conidi

customer_reviews.title: Better than taking the calcium tablets.
customer_reviews.text: The gummy tastes great, easier than taking pills. A little sweet, so I chew 2 after dinner, it serves as a little dessert. Glad that they make these for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Some good - some bad
customer_reviews.text: They are a godsend for people who have difficulty swallowing pills! Like the convenience and flavor of a chewable supplement. Size could be smaller to fit with my other pills in my pill case. Don't like the coating. It sticks to the inside of the pill box and "flakes" off and sticks to my fingers when loading my pill box. My chewable vitamins have a smooth coating that handles better.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Don't steal my diet name I'm serious
customer_reviews.text: I got these because they say I don't get enough calcium in my new diet I call the don't drink milk diet (don't steal the name I'm getting a patent tomorrow after church) so who's laughing now.
customer_reviews.author: james bedell

customer_reviews.title: This calcium won’t upset my stomach and...
customer_reviews.text: This calcium won’t upset my stomach and taste is good as well. The gummy stands for rinsing off coated sugar which make better than other kind of candy one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoli shen

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Calcium gummy!
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid we had those nasty tablets and I swear I've been scarred for life by them, thanks to their nasty before and after taste. Finally I stumbled upon these babies, they're pretty tasty,easy to take and definitely a big improvement in the supplement world!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: yuck
customer_reviews.text: is too gummy and sweet. Each piece is covered with sugar. Got rid of it and won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SDL52

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Because I am a women, my doctor recommends that I take 1000 mg of calcium per day. For years, I gagged down those awful white, chalky horse pills. My eyes lit up when I saw these. I've been buying them for a year or more and I rarely skip a dose. They taste really good. There have a variety of color-coded, fruit flavored gummies. Unlike another brand, the fruit taste is subtle, so I don't find myself preferring or disliking any flavor. They are all equally pleasant. My daughter (22) also likes them. If you have to take something to benefit your health, it should be something yummy and agreeable, like these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the Stomach!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only vitamins I've been able to take without becoming nauseous. They are a little on the sweet side for me, but am happy with sweet because it's better than a vitamin flavor/taste. The gummies are soft and easy to chew. In fact, this last bottle was the softest or freshest gummies I've had, so I will definitely look for this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Flavored chewable calcium
customer_reviews.text: Most calcium tablets are very large and I cannot easily swallow them. These gummies are chewable and have a good flavor, making them easy to take.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Calcium
customer_reviews.text: This is the best calcium gummy’s I found. Love the taste and the absorption. Needed calcium after bariatric surgery and this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get down
customer_reviews.text: Usually Calcium pills are huge and hard to get down, but these are chewy and easy to get down. Although I could do without the sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Puffer

customer_reviews.title: A winning combination
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are excellent in providing a high vitamin D dose and an above average calcium dose. I don't absorb D well, so take 2 in the morning and 2 at night, for a total of 2000 IUs of D. I also need the extra calcium, so that is an extra benefit (again, mal-absorbtion on my part). I like them better than tablets. My only request of the manufacturer might be to make them a little less 'sugary'. Overall, I recommend this product as it has proven to help me maintain a higher level of vitamin D and calcium ( I am tested every 3 months).
customer_reviews.author: CUshopping

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have to take a calcium supplement do to bariatric surgery. These are the best I've tried so far (and I've tried a lot) as far as taste and texture. No chalk film or nasty aftertaste like many of the chewables. Only problem I've had so far is that they're often out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Taste amazing and easy to consume. I have a delicate stomach when it comes to taking vitamins early in the morning, but these chewable gummies make it easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calcium Tablets
customer_reviews.text: I needed Calcium suppliments and this bottle of gummy Calcium tablets was perfect. I love the taste of them. You also get a lot of them which makes it a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: DEFINE GUMMY!
customer_reviews.text: When I hear the term gummy vitamins, I think of gummy bears, the chewy little figures that we all like, NOT! They are not real bad as far as the taste but they are not gummies. I don't quite know what you call it but it's like those orange slices with all that sugar on it. These also have the sugar on them. It is assorted flavors but 1 to 2 of the flavors are not so good, but tolerable. You are supposed to chew 2 "gummies" a day, which is a dose. My need for calcium is greater than the slightly bad taste, so I do!! It's Ok, but not a gummy!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilninie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take
customer_reviews.text: Stop this from my mother because the pill form was huge and she could not swallow. These are easy for her to take and she says they taste very good
customer_reviews.author: Amy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get calcium
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as you can chew them. They are very sweet, as I’m guessing they would otherwise be very tart, but definitely manageable and will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: Too Sweet
customer_reviews.text: The taste is good however it's too sweet for my taste. I bought it after my lupus diagnoses and it makes my teeth hurt from how sweet and chewing they are.
customer_reviews.author: Lovie

customer_reviews.title: Bad Texture
customer_reviews.text: The texture is hard for me to chew and swallow because it isn't chewy like other gummies. It's more gritty and melts in your mouth as you chew. The flavor was hard for me as well. I just can't continue these gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Thu

customer_reviews.title: Great calcium supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Been taking for over a year. I wasn’t able to take usual calcium. Not tablets or soft gels because they hurt my stomach. Mt doctor suggested I try gummies. These are fabulous!! Easy to chew with great taste and no stomach issues. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: AnWi

customer_reviews.title: chewy fruit flavored gummies...a lot nicer than swallowing hard calcium pills
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It's a nice sweet treat, 15 calories a gummy, and I'm getting all my calcium without swallowing a nasty hard pill!
customer_reviews.author: subscribe and save patron

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have never finished a bottle of vitamins in my life and now I have finished a few dozen bottles between these calcium vitamins and the matching mens multi-vitamin, I take them both daily for about 2 years now. Taste is great and it helps me want to take them each day! VitaFusion is awesome! I have celiac and I have noticed this calcium supplement helps my fingernails grow better. With celiac my nails grow nasty ridges and grooves and vertical splits in my nails. This seems to help them grow faster and with less of the ridges and splits.
customer_reviews.author: clifford5555

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Came perfectly packaged. Taste okay, good enough to encourage me to actually take my vitamins
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Lowers stomach acid, relief from cramps
customer_reviews.text: These are tasty and effective. I used them to successfully lower elevated stomach acid and they are effective for all types of cramps, including menstrual cramps. 4 stars instead of 5 because there is a little too much sugar dusted on the top of the gummies. But...they are yummy. Chewable calcium was recommended to me by a pharmacist after I was prescribed Ranitidine and Hyoscyamine for elevated stomach acid. The medications were extremely uneffective and after only 2-3 days of taking them, I was concerned about the side effects. I felt immediate relief from stomach pain after the first calcium gummy I chewed. 100% more effective than the medications
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but would like them to change ratio of Vit D to Calcium
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have mentioned, the ratio of Vitamin D to Calcium seems to be too high in this product. It is not necessarily dangerous unless you're getting a lot of Vitamin D elsewhere, since the NIH-recommended adult daily max is 4,000 IU, and one serving (2 gummies) has 1,000 IU. However, I also take fish oil, eat salmon somewhat often and take the vitafusion multivitamin with 800 IU Vitamin D. The recommended value is only 400 IU. Plus one serving is only giving you 50% DV of calcium. However, this is a great chewable option for those also allergic to dairy, which I am, so for now I will take it, but wish the company would adjust the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Para

customer_reviews.title: Much better than liquid or tablets
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't do the big tablets. The liquid calcium made me gag. These are easy & taste good
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Tough and chewy this time.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these once before and they were actually delicious! Soft and tasty like a creamsicle. This is the second time ordering them and this time they are super tough and bitter. They are not expired but something is definately different. I used to look forward to taking them and now I cringe when I have to try and chew them up. Maybe i will try a different seller or store next time.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: These weren't terrible. The taste was decent
customer_reviews.text: These weren't terrible. The taste was decent, but a bit chalky to me. All in all though it's a convenient way to get some vitamins into me since I really hate taking pills.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Mcbunny

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are chewable & like eating candy. Good flavor that makes you want to take them. No bad aftertaste, just a sweet, chewy treat
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Severely sugar coated.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to trying these as there were many positive reviews. I thought I would be getting something more like a gummy bear type of vitamin vs. a gum drop type. These are severely sugar coated (each one rolled in white granulated sugar), which seems to be the antithesis of nutrition. Rather than throw them out, I rinse them off prior to taking them, exfoliating the sugar off them to make them palatable- though still very sweet. I will continue to look for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Quell

customer_reviews.title: Quality vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These are great vitamins. They don’t lay in your stomach and upset it because of not desolving. The flavor is just like a candy gummy.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mtn Diva

customer_reviews.title: Calcium gummies are easy to chew and taste great
customer_reviews.text: Like these because I have such a difficult time swallowing the big calcium tablets
customer_reviews.author: Anna Beth Herrera

customer_reviews.title: ... my Vitamin D deficienct child and her numbers are great now. I like the fact that we can ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my Vitamin D deficienct child and her numbers are great now. I like the fact that we can tackle the calcium and Vitamin problem in one chewable. It's a nice size gummy and the taste can be a little weird to those who don't like sugary treats but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: janelle

customer_reviews.title: The Calcium is good, my doctor said I was defecient so I ...
customer_reviews.text: The Calcium is good, my doctor said I was defecient so I started taking it twice aday as the doctor suggested. Both him and I were surprised when my next blood test showed a great improvement. Now I've been taking it once aday for over a year to keep my levels up and strengthen my bones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and good for you
customer_reviews.text: These are a daily thing in my life. They really seem to help with aches in my joints. Great taste and easy to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and very chewy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste and so does my son. This has been a good product for us.
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Tastes so good, I actually look forward to taking my calcium supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Strong Nails - No breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having troubles with my nails for years, after taking these for a week or 2 I had MUCH stronger nails. Also, they’re delicious - they don’t make me break out the way a lot of “hair, skin & nails” vitamin do
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Gummy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife and she loves it. I tried one time and this is good. Hopefully, someone will follow the guide and not eat extra.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinemidnight

customer_reviews.title: great way to get your calcium supplement!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of trouble swallowing pills and have to take two calcium pills daily [they only come in very large size]. When I heard about vitafusion calcium gummy vitamins, and ordered some from Amazon it was such a wonderful gift!!!! They chew up very easy and have a great fruity taste and I no longer have to choke down giant pills. Would highly recommend these for everyone!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: snowbunny

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty calcium chews.
customer_reviews.text: Large bottle. Quick shipping. Pieces were not uniform in size so it was a little confusing. Flavor was great, very sweet and tasted more like a piece of candy. Recommend this for price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again - maybe it's just me
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because it tastes pretty good. I won't go into detail but it affects my stomach. I won't be buying these again and unfortunately I probably won't even finish these.
customer_reviews.author: Pam (Chicago)

customer_reviews.title: They're effective but are definitely not gummies
customer_reviews.text: These have the texture of cheap jelly fruit slice candies, not gummies like the multivitamins made by this brand. They are large, the size and shape of dice. These things aren't bad per se, but when trying to eat them in a hurry, it can be kind of off putting to have a mouth full of the weird texture. Otherwise, these calcium chewables seem to work just fine and do not upset my stomach. I take these to supplement gummy multivitamins which do not contain calcium.
customer_reviews.author: dee doo

customer_reviews.title: Calcium yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor. I’m not into chocolate chews so these are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: JMinGHWA

customer_reviews.title: Great calcium gummy vitamins.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. My wife has been taking these since bariatric surgery.
customer_reviews.author: ONeil Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet for this 30+ female adult
customer_reviews.text: Liked them at first. But on the daily too sweet! So I'm not getting my daily dose just for how sweet they are. Still feels like a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Nati Time

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take
customer_reviews.text: Great way to take calcium. No horse pill to swallow. Great taste!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Gummy Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I can't swallow large pills and have to use calcium tables that I can chew instead of swallow. These have the best taste of the brands I have tried. Very pleased to find them.
customer_reviews.author: cjd

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get much needed calcium especially for those like me that do not drink much milk. Please note that these do tend to dry out a bit over time. The manufacturer states that this does not affect the potency of the contained calcium. Pros: Great taste Decent amount of calcium Cons: Dry out slightly over time
customer_reviews.author: madspeed

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like candy!
customer_reviews.text: This tastes a bit too much like candy so with 200% of my daily vitamin D (to support Calcium absorption) I have to be careful not to eat too many.
customer_reviews.author: AMYL

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I needed more calcium in my life because I HATE the taste of milk. So this gives me 50% of the daily value. For some reason I thought it would be 100% but it's no biggie because I do eat a lot of yogurt. Now these gummies are a little different from the other vitafusion gummies because they have a crystal sugar coating on the outside instead of just a gummy. Still tastes good, but I like to take my vitamins in the morning and something this sweet sometimes throws me off.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this product if you are hypocalcemic. After cancer, I'm hypocalcemic and I tried these as a break from my normal pills. Three days in, my calcium levels were so low that I needed to go to the hospital to take it by IV. If you take calcium due to an actual medical condition, then don't take chances with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need to take calcium twice daily and these are ...
customer_reviews.text: I need to take calcium twice daily and these are very tasty! I actually look forward to taking them, which is more than I can say about the other chewable brand that is chocolate or caramel flavored!
customer_reviews.author: JohnsonFamilyPrimeAccount

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mellow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I am not a pill taker but I need calcium and it works for me
customer_reviews.author: Islandlife

customer_reviews.title: Good Tasting
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting calcium....great for your kids/teens to use to ensure they are getting enough calcium.
customer_reviews.author: Hefner

customer_reviews.title: These are a must have!!
customer_reviews.text: If your a bariatric patient these are a must have great flavor and it’s kind of like having two pieces of candy a nice little sweet treat for the day plus my blood levels are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Boller

customer_reviews.title: Taste like a Dreamsicle! Yum.
customer_reviews.text: You will love taking these everyday! They taste like a Dreamsicle! Best way to take calcium I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jessup, My Stuff Runneth Over!

customer_reviews.title: Yum but nope
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think it’s just candy. Sad because regular calcium always makes me slightly queasy, and these don’t so it’s not “calcium” calcium. Guess I’m stuck with the queasiness.
customer_reviews.author: Keef

customer_reviews.title: Good calcium.
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy to take calcium. Better than large tablets. Tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: I wish they weren't vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Got them to help reduce muscle cramps, but wish they were just candy. They're delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Danl70

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I bought these while i was pregnant to boost my calcium intake for the two babies growing in my belly. I generally like the other gummy vitamins and take the prenatal and fish oil ones on a regular basis. These definitely have a different texture which isn't BAD but not as yummy as the regular ones. I guess if you are really set on getting enough calcium and don't like dairy products, this would be a good alternative. I love milk, cheese, ice cream...all dairy products...so getting enough calcium isn't a very big challenge for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The only calcium chew that doesn't upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: christina cooper

customer_reviews.title: Yum.
customer_reviews.text: These are so good. I was taking the chew vita something ones. They taste like candy but these are so good. It's like having a snack. They're thick, juicy, and have amazing taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cvincent

customer_reviews.title: I love the vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I will not buy again online in the summer, the product was in the verge of melting in the south Texas heat
customer_reviews.author: Christina Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: The best vitamin for absorption
customer_reviews.text: VitaFusion Calcium plus D3 is the best gummy to elevate your counts.
customer_reviews.author: BRaysGemstone

product_meta.title: Vitafusion Calcium, Gummy Vitamins for Adults, 500 mg, 100 Count
product_meta.description: Indulge in a delicious calcium treat. A fusion of essential nutrients and natural fruit and cream flavors, two vitafusion Calcium gummies provide an excellent source of calcium and vitamin D. Each serving supports bone health with 500 mg of calcium and 1,000 IU of Vitamin D.
feature_bullets: 500 mg of calcium per serving, as much as 12 oz. of milk
Clinically Proven Absorption for vitamin D3
Contains NO high-fructose corn syrup, NO artificial sweeteners, NO gluten, NO dairy and NO synthetic (FD&C) dyes
